r2b.apps.utils.cipher

Class AESCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • r2b.apps.utils.cipher.AESCipher

  • public class AESCipher
extends java.lang.Object
    AES 128 bits cipher utility class. Encrypt/Decrypt strings. Previously of the using of this class you should see: http://android-developers.blogspot.com.es/2013/08/some-securerandom-thoughts.html

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(Context context)
        Init the class. You must call this method to fix Java Cryptography Architecture bug.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.

      • encrypt

        public static java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String plainText)
        Encrypt plain text and returns as base64 string.
        Parameters:
        plainText -
        Returns:
        The plain text encrypted if no error, the plain text if is null or size is zero.

      • decrypt

        public static java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String base64Text)
        Decrypt base64 text and returns as a plain string.
        Parameters:
        base64Text -
        Returns:
        The plain text decrypted if no error, the base64 text no decrypted if is null or size is zero.

      • isInitialized

        public static boolean isInitialized()
        Get if cipher was initialized.
        Returns:
        True initialized, false otherwise.
